title: v1.6.3.3 Critical Bug Fixes
details:
v1.6.3.3 addressed 14 critical Quick Tab bugs:

1. Instance Tracking Loss - Re-register window in quickTabsMap after restore in VisibilityHandler.handleRestore()
2. Stale Map Entries - Already handled via DOM re-verification in UICoordinator.update()
3. Delayed Map Cleanup - Already fixed via immediate cleanup in UICoordinator.update()
4. Z-Index Never Increments - Track _highestZIndex in UICoordinator, apply _getNextZIndex() after restore
5. DOM Attached Check Returns Truthy Object - Already fixed in v1.6.4.10 (Boolean() wrap in isRendered())
6. Close Button Doesn't Trigger DestroyHandler - Use internalEventBus for DestroyHandler so state:deleted reaches UICoordinator
7. Map Never Decrements - Now properly handled via state:deleted event on internal bus to UICoordinator.destroy()
8. DOM Detaches Post-Restore - Attempt re-render on unexpected detachment in _startDOMMonitoring()
9. Drag Doesn't Bring Restored Tabs to Front - Enhanced logging to verify onFocus callback wiring

UID Display Bugs:
1. All UIDs Display Identically - Changed truncation to show LAST N characters (unique random suffix at end)
2. UID Disappears After Restore - Update showDebugId setting on instance before restore render
3. "Tab not found" Warnings - Remove spurious warnings that fire during successful operations
4. Duplicate Iframe Processing Logs - Already minimal, no changes needed
5. Settings Loading Desync - Make UICoordinator use same storage source as CreateHandler (storage.local with 'quickTabShowDebugId' key)

Key Event Bus Fix: DestroyHandler was using external eventBus but UICoordinator listens on internalEventBus. Fixed by passing internalEventBus to DestroyHandler.
